The IT Majlis of Dawat-e-Islami is privileged to present these MadanÄ« InâÄmÄt with a mobile application software.Through this software, you can perform Fikr-e-Madinah on a daily basis according to the MadanÄ« InâÄmÄt and this software will automatically show your monthly performance at the end of the month. Further, through this app, you can also email your performance to your responsible Islamic brother of MadanÄ« InâÄmÄt.
